question: What's something you've always been naturally drawn to that others might find puzzling?
What's one thing you hope someone notices about you without you having to point it out?
What's a belief you held strongly in the past that you've since completely changed your mind about?
When have you felt most proud of staying true to your values, even when it was difficult?
What's the most meaningful conversation you've had with someone recently?
If you could have dinner with the person you'll be in 10 years, what would you want to ask them?
What's something you create or build that brings you genuine joy, regardless of what others think?
Tell me about a time when you surprised yourself with your own strength or resilience.
What makes you feel most deeply understood by another person?
What's something you're currently learning that excites you, even if you're terrible at it right now?
